PERMITS
=======

**Anyone Working in the City of Edgecliff as a Contractor is REQUIRED to Register with our City and submit an Application for each of the following: Building, Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing, Fence (even if replacing just a panel on the fence) and Driveway Approach/Curb-cut.**

 

To ensure safe, quality workmanship the Town of Edgecliff Village enforces the 2024 International Building Code, 2024 International Mechanical Code, 

2024 International Plumbing Code, 2024 National Electrical Code, and for the residential 2024 IRC - International Residential Code.

Permits are required for new construction, additions, alterations or repairs, both residential and commercial.

Applications for these can be found by clicking on the flag.

The general contractor will be responsible for making sure all sub-contractors involved with the project are registered to perform work in Edgecliff Village and have filled out the necessary permit applications at City Hall.

Inspections require twenty-four hour notification prior to the day of the inspection. Inspections will be made in the afternoon between 12:00 p.m. -5:00 p.m. No special appointment times will be accepted. The number to call to schedule an inspection is

(817)293-4313. 

Plans that require Engineer review may be sent to an invoice from the Town of Edgecliff Village. 

\*The Building/ Fire Official may require as much as 10 (Ten) business days for plan review. 

Please submit Business Insurance, Licences, and Contractors ID with both registration and permits.

﻿If you have questions, please contact the Permit Clerk at (817)293-4313.

[![](//img1.wsimg.com/isteam/ip/49312170-715c-46ac-adf7-429542be2f6e/american-flag-etiquette-jpg-removebg-preview.png/:/cr=t:0%25,l:0%25,w:100%25,h:100%25/rs=w:400,h:400,cg:true)](https://evgov.org/forms-and-applications-2#a028204c-c04c-4327-b669-196277b3e57e)

**CLICK THE FLAG TO BE TAKEN TO PERMIT APPLICATIONS PAGE**

#### GARAGE SALE PERMIT

**Before you have your garage sale, make sure you comply with City Ordinance (Chapter 4, Sections 4.03.001-4.03.033) regulating these sales.**

* Obtain a permit from the City (City Hall located at 1605 Edgecliff Rd.) for $10.00. Cash / Check or Money Order (Made Out To: Town of Edgecliff Village) / \*Credit or Debit (\*3.5% Processing Fee)
* ﻿Property owners may hold 2 garage sales per calendar year and may last up to three (3) consecutive calendar days.
* NO REFUNDS OF A GARAGE SALE PERMIT FEE SHALL BE PERMITTED FOR ANY REASON.
* Signs may be posted following the issuance of a permit. No signs shall be permitted on utility poles or public property, including street rights-of-way and easements.
* Signs may be posted a maximum of two (2) days prior to the garage sale being held, and such signs shall be removed within twenty-four (24) hours following the last day of the sale. All signs shall comply with size requirements of the sign regulations.
* Temporary signs advertising garage sales or similar activities shall be permitted subject to the following restrictions:  Maximum sign area: 2.5 square feet;  Maximum height: 2.5 feet.
* NO SIGNS ARE PERMITTED ON CROWLEY ROAD. It is violation of State Law (Chapter 392 and 393, Transportation Code) to place signs in the right-of-way of a Highway.
* Impoundment of unlawful signs. See Code § 3.06.005. <https://ecode360.com/41160241#41160155>
* Permit may be revoked if, in the opinion of the Code Enforcement Officer or a Peace Officer, the safety and welfare of the general public would be jeopardized if the sale is allowed to continue.

To Apply For A Garage Sale :

1. Click The Red Button Below.

2. Fill Out Application.

3. Bring Application and Driver's License To City Hall To Submit.

or email to [ub@evgov.org](mailto:ub@evgov.org)

\* Garage Sale Permits are $10.00

[Garage Sale Application](https://img1.wsimg.com/blobby/go/49312170-715c-46ac-adf7-429542be2f6e/downloads/683b14fb-7284-4c6e-822d-627256d91ad6/Garage%20Sale%20Application.pdf?ver=1733249231497)

#### Solicitor's Permit

**Anyone soliciting within the city limits of Edgecliff is REQUIRED to obtain a solicitor's permit. All applicants for a Solicitor's Permit  must come by City Hall to complete an application.  A non-refundable fee of $25.00 will be required. Payment must be made by cash, check or money order.**

[Solicitor's Permit Application](https://img1.wsimg.com/blobby/go/49312170-715c-46ac-adf7-429542be2f6e/downloads/9cc3bdea-ea45-4a31-99bf-2f3345a3ef59/Solicitors%20Permit%20Application.pdf?ver=1733249686776)
